Ưu tiên ứng viên tốt nghiệp các trường Bách Khoa, Học viện Bưu chính, ĐH Công nghệ-ĐH Quốc gia Hà Nội, Học viện Kỹ thuật Quân sự hoặc các trường ĐH đào tạo ở quốc tế. ● Có ít nhất 2++ năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trở lên một trong các ngôn ngữ sau Python, Java, Scala. job_details.description: About the Role About the Role At Siraya, we build cutting-edge IT solutions that drive growth and innovation. We’re looking for a Fullstack Developer who’s not only a strong coder but also a problem-solver who can design scalable architectures and drive impact across the stack — from frontend experiences to backend systems and infrastructure. We are seeking a talented and experienced Full stack Developer (from Middle Level) to join our growing team. Key Responsibilities ● Develop and maintain web applications using modern frontend technologies such as React, Next.js, Vue.js, and jQuery. ● Build and optimize backend services and APIs using JavaScript (Node.js) and Go. ● Collaborate with team members to design and implement new features and functionalities with scaling capabilities ● Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. ● Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices. ● Troubleshoot and debug issues, providing timely resolutions. ● Participate in code reviews and contribute to the improvement of our development processes. ● Stay up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends. Key Responsibilities Your skills and experience Requirements ● Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field. ● Minimum of 4 years of experience in fullstack development. ● Proficient in frontend technologies: React, Next.js, Vue.js, jQuery. ● Strong knowledge of backend technologies: JavaScript (Node.js) and Go, PHP ● Good knowledge of Design Pattern ● Familiar with Cloud Services like as: AWS, GCP, Azure ● Strong understanding any kind of CDN Services like as: Cloudflare, Cloudfront, Akamai ● Strong knowledge of multiple common types of Databases including SQL and No- SQL ● Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. As the plus ● Understanding Networking, OS, System Fine-tune

As the plus ● Understanding Networking, OS, System Fine-tune As the plus Why you'll love working here We offer a competitive compensation structure, including annual salary reviews, performance bonuses, and a profit-sharing bonus tied to both individual contributions and company growth. job_details.description: About the Role: About the Role: We're looking for a Data Scientist to join our Insights & Personalization pod, a team focused on transforming raw financial data into intelligent, adaptive experiences that help customers understand their money and make better financial decisions. This role is perfect for someone who sees data not just as numbers, but as patterns of human behavior that can unlock meaningful insights. You'll work on foundational intelligence systems, from transaction enrichment and pattern recognition to predictive modeling and behavioral analytics, that power personalized financial experiences across our platform. The insights and models you develop will directly shape what customers see and experience in their daily financial lives. You'll be deeply involved in AI/ML solutions, collaborating closely with engineering teams to turn data insights into production systems. Operating within the Tyme Group's multi-market environment, you'll build data systems that get smarter over time, creating compounding value through network effects and continuous learning loops that scale across geographies. The insights and models you develop will directly shape what customers see and experience in their daily financial lives. What you'll do: What you'll do: As a Data Scientist, you'll work across the full data science lifecycle, from exploration and modeling to production deployment and continuous optimization, turning raw financial data into actionable intelligence that drives customer experiences. You will: Collect, structure, clean, and analyze large datasets using the latest statistical tools and techniques, understanding the human and financial behaviors the data represents. Develop statistical models and algorithms to predict trends, behaviors, and patterns in customer financial data. Build machine learning models for various use cases across the organization to predict customer behavior, identify opportunities, and drive business outcomes. Develop and implement creative ways of displaying and disseminating insights, bringing the consumer and data to life in a manner that engages all stakeholders. Use research and insight to drive cultural change within the organization, ensuring stakeholders put consumers at the heart of their planning and strategic thinking. Deliver ad hoc consumer insight projects that inform decision making for management and collaborate with internal teams to identify business problems and provide data-driven solutions. Interpret and analyze data from multiple sources, providing key analytics and proactively recommending actionable next steps across various stakeholders and teams. Think strategically and communicate creatively to inform and drive stakeholder decision making. Effectively use business data from multiple sources to craft compelling stories that guide activities and decisions. job_details.skills_json: ["Data Engineer", "Databricks", "Spark", "Java", "Python", "Cloud", "Data Engineer - UPTO 2000$ - ĐI LÀM SAU TẾT", "SQL", "Oracle", "ETL", "NoSQL", "Data Engineer (Apache Spark, PostgreSQL, Python, Java)", "Kafka", "PostgreSql", "Apache Spark", "Data Engineer (SQL/NoSQL, AWS) - CRM", "AWS", "Data Engineer (Spark, AWS Glue, Python) (Onboard ASAP)", "English", "AWS Glue", "Data Engineer (SQL/ Python/ Cloud)", "Data Warehousing", "Big Data", "Database", "MLOps", "Mid/Sr. Data Engineer (Azure/AWS, ML, English)", "Machine Learning", "Azure", "Lead Data Engineer (Azure, ETL)"]
job_details.description: • Lead the team to improve scalability, reliability, and cost-efficiency of the Data Platform. • Design, build, and deploy data pipelines (batch & streaming) using Spark orchestrated via Airflow. • Develop libraries and frameworks for data ingestion, transformation, and governance with clean architecture principles. • Collaborate with Data Architects to design/review data models, enforce data contracts, and maintain schema governance. • Optimize performance with partitioning, caching, Z-Ordering, and metadata management in lakehouse environments (Delta/Iceberg/Hudi). • Ensure security and compliance: IAM, encryption, secrets management, and GDPR/CCPA adherence. • Drive CI/CD for data workflows, IaC (Terraform), and container orchestration (Kubernetes). • Monitor SLOs/SLAs, implement alerting, and lead incident responses and postmortems. • Design and operate end-to-end ML/LLM pipelines: data prep, training, evaluation, and deployment. • Build RAG architectures, vector search, and embedding pipelines for LLM-based applications. Your skills and experience 1. Must have: • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a related technical field • English is required • Have 5+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or Software Engineer • Have experience in Cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP) • Extremely proficient in at least 1 programming language (Python/Scala/Java) • Strong experience in systems architecture – particularly in complex, scalable, and fault- tolerant distributed systems • Good at multi-threading, atomic operations, computation framework: Spark (DataFrame, SQL, ...), distributed storage, distributed computing • Understand designs of resilience, fault-tolerance, high availability, and high scalability, ... • Tools: CI/CD, Gitlab, ... • Good at communication & team working • Being open-minded, willing to learn new things 2. Nice to have: • Experience with Databricks (Delta Lake, Unity Catalog, Delta Live Tables) or similar lakehouse technologies is a strong plus. • Proven ability in performance tuning and optimization for Big Data workloads (Spark/Flink, partitioning, shuffle strategies, caching). • Familiarity with modern data transformation frameworks (dbt). • Knowledgeable in AI and LLM technologies is a plus, including prompt engineering, embeddings, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). • Hands-on experience with vector databases (ChromaDB, Vector Search) and LLMOps practices.

job_details.description: Position Overview This position is for a Technical Leader (Full-Stack Engineer). The focus is on technical leadership and hands-on development rather than people management. The main responsibilities are as follows: ● System design and technology selection ● Breaking down requirements into technical tasks ● Code and design reviews ● Providing technical support and guidance to engineers You will work closely with the PM/PMO team and engineers in Japan and Vietnam to drive the development forward. Job Responsibilities 1. Requirements Understanding & Design ● Accurately understand the product requirements and specifications. ● For existing products: ❖ Analyze the impact of new requirements. ❖ Create a list of functions that need modification or addition. ● For new products: ❖ Create a list of functions. ❖ Perform basic system design. ● Select appropriate technologies and architectures according to the requirements. 2. Task Breakdown & Effort Estimation ● Break down functions into technical tasks. ● Provide realistic and reasonable effort estimates. ● Collaborate with the PMO to create schedules and assign tasks. 3. Technical Leadership & Reviews ● Conduct reviews for the following deliverables: ○ Effort estimates ○ Design and technical documents ○ Source code (frontend/backend) ● Ensure code quality, performance, and maintainability. ● Propose solutions to technical challenges, taking into account: ○ Cost ○ Performance ○ Scalability ○ Operations and maintenance 4. Hands-on Development ● Participate in development as needed. ● Support the implementation of complex or critical features. ● Collaborate with team members to solve technical challenges. 5. Technical Support & Mentoring ● Provide technical support to engineers. ● Share best practices and knowledge. ● Offer guidance aimed at improving the technical skills of junior and mid-level engineers. Technical Stack Frontend: ● React.js ● Next.js Backend: ● Node.js Database: ● MongoDB (required) ● MySQL (optional) ● PostgreSQL (optional) Infrastructure / Cloud: ● AWS (main) ● GCP (DWH) Position Overview The main responsibilities are as follows: Job Responsibilities Your skills and experience Required Skills & Experience (Must) ● 5+ years of practical experience as a full-stack engineer, or equivalent skills. ● Frontend development experience using React.js / Next.js. ● Backend development experience using Node.js. ● Development, design, and operational experience with MongoDB. ● Ability to conduct code reviews on both frontend and backend with attention to: ❖ Readability ❖ Maintainability ❖ Performance ● Ability to analyze issues, identify root causes, and plan corrective actions, including application, infrastructure, and external services. ● Knowledge of basic security risks and countermeasures for Web/Mobile applications. ● Experience in building or operating infrastructure using AWS (regardless of scale). Preferred Skills & Experience (Nice to Have) ● Development experience for B2C (toC) products. ● Experience in task management using tools such as JIRA. ● Experience in designing and building CI/CD pipelines. ● Development experience using MySQL or PostgreSQL. ● Track record of improvements in development processes, code quality, and productivity. ● Knowledge of cost optimization and performance improvement in cloud environments (AWS/GCP). ● Understanding of AI agent development and experience developing with AI code editors. Attractive Points of This Position ● Opportunity to demonstrate skills in technology selection and system design. ● A Tech Lead role with minimal management responsibilities, allowing focus on technical work. ● Involvement in both new and existing products. ● Participation in a global development environment with teams in Japan and Vietnam. ● A role with technical challenges and significant impact.

job_details.description: About TymeX About TymeX TymeX is Tyme Group 's Technology & Product Development Hub with a global mission to become serial bank builders. TymeX Tyme Group Our Financial Crime platform plays a critical role in protecting customers and the bank from fraud, money laundering, and other financial crimes using advanced data, AI, and automation. Financial Crime About the Role About the Role We are seeking a Graph Data Engineer to join the Financial Crime Platform team at TymeX. You’ll play a key role in designing, implementing, and optimizing graph-based data models that uncover relationships across customers, entities, devices and transactions — helping our teams detect fraud, identify hidden connections, and streamline case investigations. Graph Data Engineer You will work with graph databases and visualization tools, collaborating closely with our Data, Compliance, and Product teams to power advanced analytics and case management workflows. graph databases Key Responsibilities Key Responsibilities Design and implement graph data models that represent complex relationships between customers, organizations, transactions, devices, behaviour and events. Build graph data pipelines to extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from multiple internal and external sources. Develop efficient queries and Graph Data Science algorithms to support entity resolution, link analysis, and investigative insights. Work with graph visualization tools to build intuitive investigation tools for investigators and analysts. Collaborate with Financial Crime/Fraud analysts to translate investigation use cases into graph-driven solutions. Optimize data performance and ensure data quality across graph structures. Partner with software engineers and data scientists to integrate graph data into wider Financial Crime/Fraud workflows and detection logic. Design and implement graph data models that represent complex relationships between customers, organizations, transactions, devices, behaviour and events. graph data models Build graph data pipelines to extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from multiple internal and external sources. graph data pipelines Develop efficient queries and Graph Data Science algorithms to support entity resolution, link analysis, and investigative insights. queries and Graph Data Science algorithms Work with graph visualization tools to build intuitive investigation tools for investigators and analysts. Collaborate with Financial Crime/Fraud analysts to translate investigation use cases into graph-driven solutions. Financial Crime/Fraud analysts Optimize data performance and ensure data quality across graph structures. Partner with software engineers and data scientists to integrate graph data into wider Financial Crime/Fraud workflows and detection logic. Your skills and experience Must-Have: 5+ years of experience in Data Engineering, Graph Data Modeling , or related fields. Hands-on experience with graph databases (e.g., Neo4j, TigerGraph, JanusGraph, Neptune or similar). Proficiency in Python or PySpark for data manipulation and integration on Databricks. job_details.description: Main Responsibilities: Main Responsibilities: Main Responsibilities: As an Agentics AI Engineer, you will collaborate closely with AI Researchers, Data Scientists, and Software Engineers to build autonomous systems capable of reasoning, planning, using external tools, and collaborating with other agents to achieve complex goals. Your responsibilities will include: As an Agentics AI Engineer, you will collaborate closely with AI Researchers, Data Scientists, and Software Engineers to build autonomous systems capable of reasoning, planning, using external tools, and collaborating with other agents to achieve complex goals. Your responsibilities will include: Model Development: Developing, and fine-tuning models using state-of-the-art AI algorithms and techniques mostly for agentic systems, encompassing computer vision and NLP. Research and Experimentation: Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI model architectures in mult-imodal fields and approaches to enhance the performance and accuracy of existing products. Stay at the forefront of cutting-edge developments in AI and apply them to real-world projects. Data Preprocessing: Working on data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data augmentation to optimize and improve model training processes. Integration: Developing API interfaces for model interaction, closely collaborating with software engineering teams to integrate and deploy generalized AI models into real-world applications and systems. This will enhance customer interaction, automate processes, and improve decision-making capabilities. Model Development: Developing, and fine-tuning models using state-of-the-art AI algorithms and techniques mostly for agentic systems, encompassing computer vision and NLP. Research and Experimentation: Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI model architectures in mult-imodal fields and approaches to enhance the performance and accuracy of existing products. Stay at the forefront of cutting-edge developments in AI and apply them to real-world projects. Data Preprocessing: Working on data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data augmentation to optimize and improve model training processes. Integration: Developing API interfaces for model interaction, closely collaborating with software engineering teams to integrate and deploy generalized AI models into real-world applications and systems. This will enhance customer interaction, automate processes, and improve decision-making capabilities. Your skills and experience Job Requirement: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. Experience in building with Multimodal (LLM/VLM or speech) agentic systems using Langchain, LLamaIndex or any popular agentic platforms Proven experience in developing and fine-tuning machine learning models for computer vision and natural language processing including Data preparation, model fine-tuning and deployments. Experience with prompt engineering or context engineering. Knowledge of Vector Databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus, or pgvector) for RAG and long-term memory. Building an LLM/VLM model as a core model of the RAG components that achieved a high ranking on Vietnamese/English datasets is an advantage. Experience in optimize AI or LLM/VLM models is a plus. Experience in deployment in serve platform suchs as vllm or Nvidia Dynamo is a plus DevOps/MLOps: Proficiency with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) is a plus Evaluations: Experience with frameworks like LangSmith or Arize Phoenix to debug and evaluate agent performance. Soft skills Requirement: Systems Thinking: Ability to visualize complex, non-linear workflows and "loops." Problem-Solving: Strong debugging skills for non-deterministic systems Ethics & Security: A "safety-first" mindset regarding autonomous actions

Why you'll love working here Trải nghiệm Thu nhập hấp dẫn với gói đãi ngộ toàn diện: Thưởng thành tích tháng 13; Thưởng thành tích theo kết quả công việc 06 tháng, 1 năm ; Thưởng các dịp lễ tết trong năm ; Thưởng theo danh hiệu cá nhân và tập thể… Du lịch nghỉ dưỡng hàng năm Khám sức khỏe định kì Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe cá nhân và người thân (MIC) Quà tặng và ngày nghỉ sinh nhật hưởng nguyên lương Cơ hội nghề nghiệp và phát triển bản thân: Được thử sức với các nền tảng công nghệ mới, tham gia vào những dự án chuyển đổi lớn của ngân hàng Có cơ hội học hỏi từ các Chuyên gia, Lãnh đạo nội bộ hàng đầu tại MB trong lĩnh vực IT, Tài chính ngân hàng Được trải nghiệm các phương pháp học tập mới và phát triển năng lực theo lộ trình công danh. Hưởng các chính sách hỗ trợ, khuyến khích học tập, nâng cao trình độ và phát triển bản thân (chứng chỉ nghề quốc tế...) Môi trường làm việc lý tưởng với: Những người cộng sự thân thiện và tài năng Cơ sở vật chất, không gian làm việc xanh và hiện đại.

job_details.description: Tham gia phát triển dự án IOS với khách hàng Nhật. Làm việc theo mô hình phát triển dự án Agile, Scrum. Tham gia xây dựng các giải pháp, viết các phần mềm theo yêu cầu của công ty Lập trình các module tính năng theo bản phân tích thiết kế Làm việc tại số 1 Đào Duy Anh, Phương Mai, Đống Đa, Hà Nội Tham gia phát triển dự án IOS với khách hàng Nhật. Làm việc theo mô hình phát triển dự án Agile, Scrum. Agile, Scrum. Tham gia xây dựng các giải pháp, viết các phần mềm theo yêu cầu của công ty Lập trình các module tính năng theo bản phân tích thiết kế Làm việc tại số 1 Đào Duy Anh, Phương Mai, Đống Đa, Hà Nội Your skills and experience ▼Kỹ năng yêu cầu Có từ 1,5 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển ứng dụng iOS (Swift) trên Mobile. Có kinh nghiệm：XML, JSON, REST, SOAP Có kinh nghiệm hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu như SQLite... Có khả năng làm việc tự chủ và kỹ năng làm việc theo nhóm. Khả năng nắm bắt, học hỏi kỹ thuật mới nhanh. Ưu tiên có thêm kinh nghiệm về một trong số các ngôn ngữ sau Flutter/ Android/ React Native/ PHP,… Hoà đồng, sẵn sàng hợp tác cùng với mọi người để hoàn thành mục tiêu chung. Có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao (với công việc, với khách hàng, với thành viên của Team và với chính mình) Chi tiết khác trao đổi thêm khi phỏng vấn. ▼Kĩ năng mong muốn khác Có kinh nghiệm về AWS hoặc cloud server khác là một lợi thế Phát triển ứng dụng dành cho dịch vụ cloud Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế tài liệu (tài liệu thiết kế chi tiết, tài liệu test case.) Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng SDK nhiều lĩnh vực (APNs, DB (CoreData), Background communication, Maps…) Tích cực chủ động đề xuất cải tiến.
